body:
`ace` stage error(I'm not sure it's my internet problem or not), after I change the hash, `ace` can install successfully:
```
==> Installing ace
==> No binary for ace found: installing from source
==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ace-6.5.6-kjxukcyj2xjqtjcugfati6oig6ldhlks/ACE-6.5.6.tar.gz
    Expected 7717cad84d4a9c3d6b2c47963eb555d96de0be657870bcab6fcef4c0423af0de but got b6f9ec922fbdcecb4348e16d851d0d1f135df1836dfe77d2e0b64295ddb83066

/home/xiaojun/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1153, in do_fetch:
       1150        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
       1151        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1152
  >>   1153        if checksum and self.version in self.versions:
       1154            self.stage.check()
       1155
       1156        self.stage.cache_local()
```
title: Installation issue: ace
